SELECT WRITE_SEQ, NAME, EMAIL, INTRO, FILE_SYSTEM FROM WRITER WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
AND WRITE_SEQ = (SELECT WRITE_SEQ FROM ARTICLE WHERE CATEGORY LIKE '%'|| #{searchWord})||'%'
AND WRITE_SEQ = (SELECT WRITE_SEQ FROM ARTICLE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchWord})||'%'
ORDER BY ${searchSort} ${sort}
